product_name: Leki Cristallo Antishock Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Leki Cristallo Antishock Trekking Poles help reduce stress on your knees by supporting and stabilizing your steps when you venture on and off the trail. Antishock system absorbs shock with minimal rebound. Speed Lock adjustment on the upper shaft features a quick, strong and secure external lever mechanism that is easy to manipulate, even when wearing thick gloves. Super Lock adjustment on the lower shaft features a simple, lightweight internal twist-lock mechanism that is engineered to support up to 300 lbs. Aluminum alloy allows thin shaft walls, providing a 20% reduction in swing weight without loss of strength; 3-section telescoping poles extend from 27.2 - 53.2 in. Light and soft Aergon rubber grips feature an edgeless shape and a textured surface to maximize comfort and minimize hand fatigue. Baskets provide extra support on soft terrain; durable carbide tips optimize grip on ice and rocks. Scratch-resistant surfaces and high-polish lacquer help protect the Leki Cristallo Antishock Trekking Poles from abrasion.
short_description: The Leki Cristallo Antishock Trekking Poles help reduce stress on your knees by supporting and stabilizing your steps when you venture on and off the trail.
